name: Hime no Koiwazurai
nutshell: The servants and Lady Florentina's family noticed that Lady Florentina seems to have love sickness. What is truly going on with her?

name: Iceland
nutshell:
As an anecdote on any voyage, three enigmatic protagonists seek for a fourth character in an environment in which even the most everyday action (watching TV, fishing, sleeping, taking a taxi) will turn strange. A place to discover and decipher characters. These are the components of this visual adventure that is called Iceland.
A new surrealist tale by the creator of neo manga, the critically-acclaimed Yuichi Yokoyama. His frenetic visual style contrasts with the taciturn pace of the story and dialogue as a group of friends wander the high-latitude areas of the strange icy Far North looking for someone. Readers of Yokoyama's other stories may even recognize some characters.

name: Cellphone Girl Heaven
nutshell:
Ginta's father works at a cellphone company called "Choto Bank." Their new cellphone is a humanoid cellphone. Gina's father sent his son a prototype version of the humanoid cellphone, but Ginta's sister unexpectedly made some "changes" to the new cellphone and due to that it makes countless mistakes. The cellphone humanoid, named Momoko, slips on flat surfaces, rips Ginta's jacket, turns a jacket into a puzzle, and trips and nearly kills Ginta when a pair of scissors slip out of her hand. Ginta asks himself, "Will I live long in this condition?"
Notice: Reads left to right.

name: The Idolm@ster Cinderella Girls - Mayu in The Dream (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Mayu's final decision
Final volume after "White Spider Lily" and "Mayu who took the ribbon"

name: Re_Ghotion's Bandori Single Image Compilation
nutshell:
A collection of stand alone single page comics/images by re_ghotion located here: https://twitter.com/re_ghotion
Note: The genres will vary depending on the image.

name: Toriko ni Natta... Kemono
nutshell: In order to help his super busy secretary lover Saijo Chicharu, Kazuki Toudo decided to work in his father's company. Then he suddenly learns of Chicharu's arranged marriage….

name: Real Kiss
nutshell:
Collection of short stories:


Real Kiss
The player, Fujikawa Mitsuki, likes to tease Haruna. One day their cell phones get switched. What will happen next?
(Also published in Koibana)


Real Love


Real Kiss - Heavenly Eyes


Real Kiss - Side Fujikawa

name: Sabita Kuro no Youkai
nutshell: 刀剑乱舞同人

name: Park Hanhoo's Manager
nutshell: Chansol never experienced friendship before he met Park Hanhoo, a troubled boy who terrifies school gangs and hides his face with an unruly haircut. But when a horrific event turns Chansol's world upside down, he is forced into hiding and reneges on his promise to stay by Hanhoo's side. Now an adult, he’s back to resolve old issues, but with the truth about his past hidden behind a world of mafia bosses and shady business, his only option is to infiltrate it as the manager of an unhinged arms dealer. As Chansol sets out to coax information out of his new boss, he realizes that seducing this handsome maniac may just bring him closer to the truth and the friend he used to call Park Hanhoo.

name: Dekiai Gekokujou - Motoyan Tsuma to, Ichizu na Jirou
Love Live!, Love Live! Sunshine!! - Yoshiko Nico PLEASE!!
Yarinaoshi Tensei Reijou Hazamaa Shitai no ni Dekiaisareru
nutshell:
長年家族から冷遇されてきた公爵家令嬢のディアは、いつかこの家から出ていきたいと考えていた。しかし、結婚でやっと家から出られると思ったら、婚約者のアーノルド王子は愛人を侍らせディアを無視する最低野郎。結婚式の日に、王子の愛人にわざとドレスの裾を踏まれて階段から転げ落ち、16歳の若さで死んでしまう。しかしディアは神々により特殊能力を授けられ、14歳から人生をやり直すことに。そこでディアは、今度の人生は『アーノルドに徹底的にざまぁしてやる！』と決意する！

Original Web Novel: Pixiv, Syosetu

name: The Visitor
nutshell:
From MangaHelpers:
The title story features the earlier life of the character Oscar from the manga "Heart of Thomas." Due to many large and small problems that have added up over the years, Oscar's parents' marriage is collapsing. One day, after a fight that Oscar believes is going to end like all of the others, his father does something irreversible. Now Oscar and his father will have to deal with the consequences.

name: Haikyuu!! - 3:00pm tea party (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Tsukishima and Hinata spend an unexpected secret afternoon together.

name: Seasons
nutshell: A collection of yuri stories by Jin Takemiya.

name: Perfect Classroom
tags: Award Winning,Psychological,Long Strip,Drama,School Life,Horror,Web Comic,Mystery,Full Color
nutshell:
Two siblings who have brought several secrets along with themselves transfer to a new school. With these two at the center of attention, the classroom hierarchy gradually begins to change.
This work has received the 2015 Global Rookie Project Award.
Official English translation on Comico's Pocket Comics app

name: Hair Pulled Back Over One Ear
nutshell: White Day 2020 post from vice, who's known for Senpai x Kouhai.

name: Blue Nathanael
nutshell: An injured soldier on an alien world is rescued/captured by a soldier from the other side of the conflict.

name: Aioi Focus
nutshell: Arima, a two-faced honor student, was asked by a teacher to help Mizutani, a delinquent student with poor grades study. However, Mizutani seems disinterested in school, which only agitates Arima. Finally, in a fit of anger Arima reveals his true self. A love story that begins after school hours!

name: Omokage Maru
nutshell: Ogamine Maru is a shinobi serving the emperor who hates being used by people. However, after getting involved in a conflict that ended up in the murder of the head of a family, he begins a journey together with the head’s child for the "mokuroku" to unite the Takatsuji family again.

name: Junjou Renbo
nutshell: Karou, the male twin to the female super-model, Tsubaki, hates his face for its feminine beauty. Disgusted by the men drawn to him by his similarity to his sister, he has grown to hate any kind of contact with men. Then why is he conflicted by the attentions of Shino, the president company giving financial backing to Tsubaki's cosmetic firm? Isn't Shino just like all the other men seeking a substitute for Tsubaki?

name: Umi de Hirotta Kimi ni Sasagu
nutshell: The popular novelist in a bad mood because of his slump finds a young man naked at the beach. Furthermore, that man seems to have lost his memory?!

name: Me wo Ubau wa Hana no Kao
nutshell: With his beautiful face, Kamoi Shuu was fawned and pawed by his classmates. Noticing his discomfort, Furusawa steps in and tells Kamoi, "I'll protect you from now on." But the defenceless and charming Kamoi may prove to be his hero's undoing!

name: Mangaranai.
nutshell: I'm going to work hard on my Manga manuscripts… maybe tomorrow! The leisurely life of the blossoming girl Manga artists in the apartment building "Tokiwa-sou." ♪

name: Metallic Colors
nutshell: The story of a stylish and gaudy girl who strives to win the heart of the boy she likes.

name: Samenai Machi no Kissaten
nutshell:
One day, Suzume finds herself unable to wake up, lost in a place known as the "Unwaking Town," Lutetia.
There, she works at a coffee shop named "Quatre."

name: Nekogami Yaoyorozu
nutshell:
Even in this day and age of the 21st century, many gods live amongst humanity. Mayu is a cat god who is the master at finding lost objects, but she is very lazy and all she does all day is eat, sleep, and play video games. Mayu lives with her caretaker, Yuzu, who operates a pottery store while at the same time doing everything for Mayu. The pair meets other gods in their daily lives and have exciting adventures.

Official Release:

Indonesian release by Elex Media as Cat God (2013)
